title: Oytre
author: Oytre
content: How do you feel about the war in Ukraine and which side do you support? What kind of propagandist is going on in your country?)

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Oytre on April 30, 2023, 12:26:37 PMHow do you feel about the war in Ukraine and which side do you support? What kind of propagandist is going on in your country?)We support whoever is doing the right thing. The right thing is to slow down a full takeover of the World by the evil entity, stop One World Government, and to help neighbors under attacked by the wicked, which is exactly what Russia & Others (whether in other parts of the world, in Ukraine or Russia or both) are used for.Fortunately I tuned to what our Kingdom (which is not of this World) says and I use the information to judge things here... which is all that matter. When I listen, read or go through what people of this World and their nations say I tend to focus on what is right/true and ignore what is not true, what is wrong or bad.

comments.author: peter0425
